Name: Chisinau
Description: Chisinau is the capital and largest city of Moldova, the center of political, economic, and cultural life. It s known for its green parks and wide boulevards.

Name: Balti
Description: Balti is the second-largest city in Moldova, located in the northern part of the country. It is an industrial center and plays an important role in Moldova s economy.

Name: Tiraspol
Description: Tiraspol is the capital of the self-declared Transnistria region, known for its Soviet-style architecture and political status as part of the unrecognized breakaway state.

Name: Cahul
Description: Cahul is a city located in the south of Moldova, known for its proximity to the Danube River and its role as an important cultural and educational center.

Name: Bender
Description: Bender is a city in the breakaway region of Transnistria. It is known for its historical fortress and its industrial base, particularly in machinery and chemical production.
